[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@lynx-js/lynx-environment](./lynx-environment.md) &gt; [LynxEnv](./lynx-environment.lynxenv.md)

## LynxEnv class

A pure-JavaScript implementation of the [Lynx Spec](https://lynxjs.org/guide/spec.html)<!-- -->, notably the [Element PAPI](https://lynxjs.org/api/engine/element-api) and [Dual-threaded Model](https://lynxjs.org/guide/spec#dual-threaded-model) for use with Node.js.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class LynxEnv
```

## Example

```ts
import { LynxEnv } from '@lynx-js/lynx-environment';

const lynxEnv = new LynxEnv();

lynxEnv.switchToMainThread();
// use the main thread Element PAPI
const page = __CreatePage('0', 0);
const view = __CreateView(0);
__AppendElement(page, view);
```
